TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MimeTextBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extensibility element added to an , an , or a , specifying the text patterns for which to search the HTTP transmission. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the collection of MIME text patterns for which the HTTP transmission is searched.
Docs.value: A representing the MIME text patterns to search for.
